short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Work faster with an AI copilot that truly understands your business

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The only extension for licensed SAP CX AI Toolkit users.

Transform how you work with your AI copilot. Access in-depth customer profiles, answer questions with intelligent Q&A, and use powerful AI tools, all within your usual online workspace. 

Perfect for SAP users needing quick, AI-driven insights and tools to improve customer engagement and decision-making.
